> <OLD>
>
> Hydras smiled pleased, it was a rival less. After few seconds, he left too
> the room

<NEW>

As HYDRAS made his way out of the base, the base itself started to
spark and catch fire, flames beginning to erupt from it.

"Sooooo." HELLSCREAM as HYDRAS came out. "Now that you have killed our
boss for us, what are we going to do with you?" HEKSCREAM chuckled
evilly.

"Roger." MAX-B said as THRUSTOR and DIRGEGUN pointed their weapons at HYDRAS.

(TAG)

- Preston
